visits.text: Hike toward Lake Natron through volcanic landscapes
Crossing of the Ngare Sero river and descent into the gorges
Morning walk to observe birds at sunrise around Lake Natron

activities.text: Observation of flamingos and discovery of lava formations

visits.text: Ascent of Mount Meru over 4-5 days, an alternative to Kilimanjaro offering a spectacular view of Arusha park.
Discovery of the Maasai market and Shanga craft workshops
Visit to the Arusha Natural History Museum
Excursion to Chemka hot springs to relax in the turquoise waters
Discovery of Arusha and settling in after the flight
Safari in Arusha National Park: giraffes, buffaloes, monkeys and hippos

activities.text: Wildlife observation in Arusha park (giraffes, buffaloes, zebras) during the first kilometers of the ascent.
Traditional Tanzanian cooking class with a local association
Hike on a section of Mount Kilimanjaro
Free walk in downtown Arusha and safari preparation
Canoeing on Momella Lakes in the park to observe wildlife

visits.text: Discovery of the Kigamboni district, peaceful beaches south of Dar es Salaam.
Excursion to Bongoyo and Mbudya islands, paradise of white sand and turquoise water.
Visit to Kariakoo Market and Kivukoni Fish Market to discover local life.
Day safari to Saadani park, between savanna and Indian Ocean.

activities.text: Cultural bike tour with the Kigamboni Community Center: discovery of daily life, local cuisine and dance.

days_plan.itin_title: Tanzania Beyond the Safari: Southern Highlands & Swahili Coast Secrets

visits.text: Walk in downtown Dodoma to discover local markets and churches.
Stop at Mtera Reservoir, Tanzania's largest dam, to admire the water retention and surrounding arid landscapes.

activities.text: Walking discovery of Dodoma's commercial streets, the country's peaceful administrative capital.

visits.text: Check-in at Jambiani Beach and relaxation by the sea
Blue Safari excursion: snorkeling and lunch on a deserted beach
Visit to a seaweed farm run by women in Paje
Visit to Kuza cave and swimming in its turquoise water

activities.text: Traditional dhow sailing between islands and sandbanks
Discovery workshop on transforming seaweed into cosmetics
Cultural tour of Zanzibar: crafts, spices and local traditions
Last shopping at the local market and end of the trip

visits.text: Hike to Java Viewpoint to admire the mountainous landscapes of the Usambara.
Walk to Irente Viewpoint for a spectacular panorama at sunset.
Excursion to Kisasa waterfall, accessible on foot through local villages.

activities.text: Exploration of the dense forests of the Usambara and immersion in local villages.

visits.text: Sea excursion to swim with whale sharks in the waters of Mafia Island (season from October to February).
Snorkeling around the Big Rocks site near Chole Island.
Visit to Ras Bweni lighthouse and exploration of Utende beaches.
Paddle trip in the Juani mangrove and discovery of natural pools.

activities.text: Excursion to Mange sandbank, swimming and relaxation on a deserted islet.

visits.text: Swimming in the hot springs of Kikuletwa (Chemka) in the heart of a natural oasis.
Guided hike to Materuni Falls on the slopes of Kilimanjaro.
Discovery of Lake Chala, located in a crater on the Kenya border, with the possibility of kayaking or swimming.
Walk in the Rau Forest to observe monkeys and tropical vegetation.

activities.text: Observation of Kilimanjaro from Moshi at sunrise.
